content.rendered:
Directed by Vishal Bhardwaj

Written by Charan Singh Pathik

Cast Sanya Malhotra (Genda Kumari ‘Chhutki’). Radhika Madan (Champa Kumari ‘Badki’). Sunil Grover (Dipper Narad Muni). Vijay Raaz (Bechara Bapu). Namit Das (Jagan). Abhishek Duhan (Vishnu). Saanand Verma (Patel). Usha Nagar (Daadi). Dev Rajora (Dairy Manager) . Malaika Arora (Dancer). Dipansha Bansal (Roopanti). Chomina Beyong(Patel’s wife). Lankesh Bhardwaj (Govt. Official). J.P. Chopra (Bank Manager (as Jp Chopra)). Priyanshi Damani (3-Year Old Chhutki). Desh Deepak (TV interviewer). Kumud Dwivedi (Badki’s friend at mela). Kusum Gupta (Mela woman 1). Vilayet Hussein (Patel’s father). Samridhi Jain (!0 year old Chutki). Sameer Kakkar (Sarpanch (as Sameer Khakhar)). Altaf Khan (Shaman). Ajay Kumar (Dr. Major Shastri). Santosh Lokhande (Hawker on train). Lalita Paliwal (Ramkali). Minakshi Parmar (Mela woman 2). Amina Patel (Misri). Shakti Rawal (Jaymeet). Zoya Shah (8 year old Badki). Ankit Sharma (Mechanic). Bhuvnesh Shetty (ENT Doctor). Ajay Kumar Singh (Psychiatrist). Tvisha Solanki (Jhumki). Vinod Soni (Coaching manager). Advita Tank (4-Year Old Badki). Kunal Teli (Ballu). Prisha Vohra (Lily)

Language Hindi

Producers Rekha Bhardwaj. Vishal Bhardwaj. Ishu Bhutani. Rohit Chaudhury. Abhinav Jain. Sadanand Kadam. Ajay Kapoor. Pawan Kapoor. Imtiyaz Khan. Alan McAlex. Vikas Mehta. Ishan Saksena. Sunil Shah. Piyush Vaishnava. Dheeraj Wadhawan

Production B4U Motion Picture. Kyta Production. Vishal Bhardwaj Film
